name: Command
description: You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn according to the option you choose (Approach, Drop, Flee, Grovel, or Halt).
higherLevels: You can affect one additional creature for each spell slot level above 1.

effects.description: On a failed save, the target follows the one-word command on its next turn, which may force movement, dropping held items, or taking the Prone condition as directed.
